description.english: Pull a continous wheelie for 8 seconds in any game mode

description.schinese: 在任意模式下坚持8秒抬头特技。

description.turkish: Herhangi bir oyun modunda 8 saniye boyunca aralıksız teker kaldır
description.brazilian: Empine a moto por 8 segundos em qualquer modo de jogo

description.brazilian: Tenha um total de 25 motos na sua coleção

description.english: Reach a total of 50 bikes in your collection
description.german: Stock deine Sammlung auf 50 Bikes auf
description.french: Alignez 50 motos dans votre collection.
description.italian: Raggiungi un totale di 50 moto nella tua collezione
description.spanish: Consigue un total de 50 motos para tu colección
description.schinese: 摩托车收藏总数达到50辆
description.brazilian: Tenha um total de 50 motos na sua coleção

description.english: Reach a total of 20 bikes in your collection
description.german: Stock deine Sammlung auf 20 Bikes auf
description.french: Alignez 20 motos dans votre collection.
description.italian: Raggiungi un totale di 20 moto nella tua collezione
description.spanish: Consigue un total de 20 motos para tu colección
description.schinese: 摩托车收藏总数达到20辆
description.brazilian: Tenha um total de 20 motos na sua coleção

description.english: Win a Gold medal in each Elite Trophy of the World Tour
description.german: Gewinn eine Goldmedaille in allen Elitetrophäen der World Tour
description.french: Décrochez une médaille d'or dans chaque Elite Trophy du World Tour.
description.italian: Vinci una medaglia d'oro in ogni Elite Trophy del World Tour
description.spanish: Gana el oro en cada trofeo de élite de la gira mundial
description.schinese: 在世界巡回赛中的每场不同精英赛事件中获得一枚金牌
description.russian: В режиме "Вокруг света" получить золотые медали во всех элитных соревнованиях.
description.polish: Zdobądź złoty medal we wszystkich elitarnych trofeach mistrzostw świata
description.turkish: Her bir Dünya Turu Elit Kupasında bir Altın madalya kazan
description.brazilian: Conquiste uma medalha de ouro em todos os Troféus Elite na Turnê Mundial

description.english: Reach the 1st position of the Ranking of the World Tour
description.french: Atteignez la 1re place du classement World Tour.
description.italian: Raggiungi la prima posizione del Ranking del World Tour
description.spanish: Consigue la 1.ª posición de la clasificación de la gira mundial
description.schinese: 达到世界巡回赛排行第1名的名次
description.russian: В режиме "Вокруг света" достичь 1-го места в рейтинге.
description.polish: Zajmij 1. miejsce w rankingu mistrzostw świata
description.brazilian: Alcance a 1ª posição na Classificação da Turnê Mundial

description.english: Reach a balance of 100,000 credits
description.french: Récoltez 100 000 crédits.
description.italian: Raggiungi un totale di 100,000 crediti posseduti
description.spanish: Consigue un saldo de 100.000 créditos
description.schinese: 拥有点数达到100000点
description.brazilian: Atinja um saldo de 100.000 créditos
